choose.when: where title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or writer in ( select user_id from member where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
where writer in ( select user_id from member where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

mapper.select: select n.*, m.name from notice n left outer join member m on n.writer = m.user_id where n.id = #{id} order by id
mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, writer, filepath, filename) values (#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id}
